Package org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump

  • Class
    Description
    DumpUtils
    Utility-class that is a static facade of ObjectPrinter.ToString, where the serializing of an object is provided with JacksonTree.
    JacksonTree
    A static-factory that provides an implementation of of TreeDumper.Node over JsonNode, which is the base data-unit that is provided by Jackson-library.
    ObjectPrinter
    Interface to represent any Java-Object in most popular hierarchical structures (JSON and YAML) and with suitable output formats (TXT, HTML, SVG) with a flexible way to control the highlighting of elements.
    ObjectPrinter.StdOut
     
    ObjectPrinter.ToFile
     
    ObjectPrinter.ToString
     
    ObjectPrinter.UnitOp
    This Java-record is a kind of element in multidimensional virtual methods' table, which acts as a bridge between two hierarchies of different implementations of: TreeDumper.Node (the default factory is JacksonTree.DEFAULT_JACKSON_TREE) ObjectPrinter - StdOut, ToString and ToFile Further interaction two hierarchies are performed via well known and very popular Visitor pattern
    PrintUtils
    Utility-class that is a static facade of ObjectPrinter.DEFAULT_STD_OUT, where the serializing of an object is provided with JacksonTree.
    StringBuilderOut
    A PrintWriter over StringBuilderWriter that could simplify the substitution of System.out and System.err in unit-tests, and it's also used by other classes of the current package.
    ToFileUtils
    Utility-class that is a static facade of ObjectPrinter.ToFile
    TreeDumper
    This interface represents the ability to dump the data of JSON-like and YAML-like hierarchical structure in multicolor TEXT-base, HTML-base and SVG-base formats.
    TreeDumper.MappingsNode
     
    TreeDumper.Node
     
    TreeDumper.ScalarNode
     
    TreeDumper.SequenceNode
